Package Game.GraphicObjects.Table

Class PanelInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • Game.GraphicObjects.Table.PanelInfo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GraphicComponents, Observer, java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener
    public class PanelInfo
extends java.lang.Object
implements GraphicComponents, java.awt.event.ActionListener, Observer

    PanelInfo class

    This class abstracts the panel containing information about the course of the game, including the timer.

        n - widht of the panel.
        dim - height of the panel.
        c - background color.
        lm - LayoutManager of the panel.
        p1 - first player.
        p2 - second player.
        n_sec - number of seconds of the timer.
